
Given three integer  X ,  Y  and Z. Find maximum value of   p   such that Z ^ p   divides  factorial of (X*Y).


Input
Input will begin with an integer T (at most 100), the number of test cases. T testcases follow, each having three space seprated integer  X, Y, Z  (2 ≤ Z ≤ 10^9 , 2 ≤ Y ≤ 10^9, 2 ≤ Z ≤ 10^12 ).


Output
For each test case, output maximum value of   p.


Example

Input:
2
2 2 24
5 2 10

Output:
1
2
